title: Thursday Post Show (01-27-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (01-27-21)
description:
A special edition of the post show! Amy and Morgan2 had the chance to interview Nina Dobrev (Vampire Diaries / Degrassi: The Next Generation) to talk about her new movie Redeeming Love. They also talk to her about her Netflix movie and have her questions you sent in online!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
